alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 4:18AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An area of snow showers will affect southern Ashtabula and Crawford Counties Until 530 AM EST.... At 418 AM EST, radar indicated a snow shower near Harmonsburg, or 10 miles west of Meadville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility dropping to less than three quarters of a mile... Up to 1 inch of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Meadville, Titusville, Cambridge Springs, Orwell, Andover, Linesville, Adamsville, Canadohta Lake, Pymatuning Central, Riceville, Harmonsburg, Lincolnville, Guys Mills, Pymatuning North, Atlantic, Hartsgrove, Roaming Shores, Pierpont, Cochranton and Saegertown. Use extra caution if you must travel. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents.
